summary: Polymorph into a wolf! Summon an Undead Dragon! Send Someone into a coma! And much more!!
descriptionHtml:
UPDATED

Knock an Enemy off their feet! Summon an Undead Dragon! Send Someone into a coma! And much more!!

This mod adds a few new spells to the game, to obtain these spells simply press `   and then type
\"help solar481 4\" and then when you see the spells simply type in again \"player.addspell xxxxxxxx\"
x= spell hexes


Spells:
* Coma
* Heat Ray
* Alter Air Currents (Invisible Unrelenting Force)
* Summon Skeletal Dragon
* Soul Thrall
* Bug Swarm
* Polymorph Into Wolf (TEST STAGE, SAVE BEFORE USING)
* Call of the Wild
* Werelight (Magelight for Longer)
* Fortify Enchanting
* Fortify Smithing
* Fortify Alchemy
* Adding more over time

Installation:
Unpack the .rar file into your Skyrim\\Data

Credits:
solar481
Bethesda Softworks Creation Kit
author: solar481
